text: As the day began to chill, it came to pass that I was standing in front of an unusual building.
A bakery they called it. But it wasn't like any bakery I'd ever seen.
Glancing through the tinted windows, I could make out something resembling a cauldron of sorts in the main building,
with loads of pastries and confectioneries, their garish colors standing out like a half lit cigarette in the cool darkness of night.
Looking back at the entrance, I notice some sort of automaton givin' me the side eye.
As I walk over to greet them, they move back and start emitting a weird light.
'Btzz'
speaker: gabotop

text: LIFEFORM DETECTED, INITIATING RECOGNITION PROTOCOL...
TARGET MATCHES THIEF BY 87%.
ESTABLISHING COMMUNICATION.
speaker: gabotop

text: 'Btzz'
speaker: gabotop

text: Unclean one, while you may have changed the apparel of your headdress, your guise doesn't protect you from my gaze.
You have returned to desecrate the great bakery of our lord vrux'eok and steal another cake.
speaker: gabotop

text: Repent for your sins and I, the arch baker of the cyberdough church shall judge you.
speaker: gabotop

text: 'Btzz'
speaker: gabotop

text: ...DIALING AUTHORITIES... REMAIN STILL ORGANIC.
speaker: gabotop

text: Hold on there um...
speaker: det

text: I AM DESIGNATED AS THE GRAND ARCH BAKER OF THE OUTER PLANES-
speaker: gabotop

text: 'Btzz'
speaker: gabotop

text: -but you, interloper, may address me as the 7th high priest of the Great One, Gabotop.
speaker: gabotop

text: I'm not doing that.
speaker: det

text: Alright “Gabo”, first things first, I'm not the fella who nicked your stuff.
I'm actually trying to track down the guy who took em.
speaker: det

text: Seems he was causing problems at the bar earlier.
speaker: det

text: Say, why don't you let me search the place eh?
Help me help you.
speaker: det

text: 'Btzz'
speaker: gabotop

text: RE IDENTIFYING SUBJECT...
speaker: gabotop

text: As the machine shines its pale light at me once again, I pull my fedora a bit closer so it can properly distinguish between the hat and some cheap cowboy hat
IDENTIFICATION COMPLETE. THERE IS [1] DISCREPANCY DETECTED
bzzt
and the article of clothing I had mistaken was the-
speaker: gabotop

text: Yeah, it's the hat, I have a fedora, the other guy has a cowb-
speaker: det

text: -it was the trenchcoat, yours is a couple shades darker than the other one.

text: ... just let me into the shop man ...
